plot: Benny is a small high school kid who spends his days dreaming of getting close to the beautiful Sydney. Problem is, she's always with hanging out with some big jock guys. If only there were a way to tell her how he felt...
title: You Deserve Better
plot_es: Benny is a small high school kid who spends his days dreaming of getting close to the beautiful Sydney. Problem is, she's always with hanging out with some big jock guys. If only there were a way to tell her how he felt...
